meta.name: Additional Equipment Reference - Manual Material Weighing
meta.description: Reference data untuk pembacaan manual material weighing/raw material consumption dari PLC SCADA
meta.purpose: TASK 5 - Manual Material Consumption Tracking (separate from equipment failure monitoring)
meta.memory_area: D9000-D9011 (allocated to avoid conflict with Equipment Failure D8000-D8022)

ADDITIONAL.description: Batch/lot number for material weighing entry
Handshake flag: 0=not read by Middleware, 1=read by Middleware

product_tmpl_id.description: Product template ID in Odoo (links to BoM)

consumption_qty.description: Material consumption quantity (scaled for PLC integer precision)

handshake_flag.description: Bidirectional handshake: Middlewareâ†’PLC marks as read after processing

notes: Manual Material Weighing data is entered by operators at weigh scale station in PLC
Data includes MO ID, Product ID, and actual consumption quantity
Handshake flag D9011 prevents duplicate consumption entries in Odoo
Memory area D9000-D9011 is SEPARATE from Equipment Failure (D8000-D8022)
TASK 5 reads this area periodically and syncs consumption data to Odoo
Consumption quantity must be scaled/100 when transmitted to PLC (e.g., 825 in PLC = 8.25 kg actual)
